DOC.brief_summary: Observational study of the efficacy of median nerve blocks performed using echographic guidance in patients presenting with or without carpal tunnel syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Median Nerve Block Performed Using Echographic Guidance
DOC.criteria: short surgical procedure (less than 30 minutes) on the hand, regional anesthesia at the elbow involving the median nerve. age less than 18 years, pregnant woman mental incapacity, poor understanding of French.
